name: Square Up! (Ninjagor)
description:
MADE FOR LOST RELIC GAME JAM

Explore an open RPG world while completing missions for your friend! Explore the theme of "Connection" while figuring out who took your friend's Electronator. Experience fun turn - based gameplay against frightful foes, and use potions to aide you.

Controls ActionControlsMoveWASDInteractE
